title: account transfer in progress
body:
hi!
i transfered my account from euw to eune about 3 or 4 hours ago.
the game told me to restart the client so i did.
i cant log in to eune and when i try to log in into euw it says "your account in progress of transfering"
what can i do?
already submitted support ticket (anonymously since i didnt had an active account then)
this is not my original account!
spent a lot of time and money on the game and i dont want to lose the account

replies.body: I did the same thing, and the account tranfering queue is About 12 Hours now.. I havent sent a ticket yet, Iâ€™m still waiting.. And i do not have the email to the account, so i cant refound my money.

There's not a whole lot we can do to help with account transfers here on the boards. You mentioned that you've submitted a ticket already, but for some reason you can't see it anymore. If you still can't access it, go ahead and shoot the accounts team another ticket using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help with getting your accounts working again.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qAfpA0jq,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-06-08T20:21:19.356+0000)
>
> There's not a whole lot we can do to help with account transfers here on the boards. You mentioned that you've submitted a ticket already, but for some reason you can't see it anymore. If you still can't access it, go ahead and shoot the accounts team another ticket using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help with getting your accounts working again.

they answered it.
without even reading the question.
apparently what would solve the missing account would me recovering the username of the account i used to ask the question (since i couldnt use the one i transferred into the planes of oblivion to ask it).
i did all of what was mentioned there. step by step. no use.
this has been going on the whole day. this is a joke.

Hmmmm that's odd that would happen. I've got your ticket pulled up, and I went ahead and looked into that transferred account and it doesn't looked like the account is stuck transferring actually. The transfer has completed and the account is on EUN now, but you had to change the username and summoner name when you transferred. 

It seems like the main issue might be that you're using the wrong username on EUW, which was what the agent in your ticket said, so double check that username and use the [**Forgot Username**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/eune/en/forgot-username) page if you can't remember.

Also, spamming the boards and other users posts isn't necessarily a good way to get our attention or a response faster. More often than not, it only prevents other people from getting help.
i didnt changed the name though, it just told me to restart the client

> [{quoted}](name=madouble,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qAfpA0jq,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T21:47:28.558+0000)
>
>
 i didnt changed the name though, it just told me to restart the client

ok i managed to get in, for some reason the username changed without notifying me and now i have a different summoner name

just the delete the account and refund me the money.
it was a mistake spending my money on a company that treat me like garbage.
i am unable to view my ticket since it requires an account for some reason.

riot is answering newer thread than mine.
feelsbadman{{item:3070}}
